events.name: Existing LCA studies on LIB production
events.wd_label: Existing LCA studies on LIB production
events.wd_description: Focuses on cell design, battery specific energy, energy consumption during manufacturing process, and electricity mix used.
events.description: Focuses on cell design, battery specific energy, energy consumption during manufacturing process, and electricity mix used.

events.name: Recent study on LIB cell chemistries
events.wd_label: Recent study on LIB cell chemistries
events.wd_description: Models the production of eight LIB cell chemistries using background life cycle inventory (LCI) data that consider future energy scenarios and sub-entities of key battery metals.
events.description: Models the production of eight LIB cell chemistries using background life cycle inventory (LCI) data that consider future energy scenarios and sub-entities of key battery metals.

events.name: Study on life cycle impacts of solid-state and conventional LIBS
events.wd_label: Study on life cycle impacts of solid-state and conventional LIBS
events.wd_description: Concludes that graphite produced in China significantly contributes to environmental impacts, and recycled battery raw materials may provide an additional source of avoided impacts.
events.description: Concludes that graphite produced in China significantly contributes to environmental impacts, and recycled battery raw materials may provide an additional source of avoided impacts.

events.name: Study on parameterized LCIs for LIB production
events.wd_label: Study on parameterized LCIs for LIB production
events.wd_description: Focuses on the influence of raw materials on LIB production and their potential impact.
events.description: Focuses on the influence of raw materials on LIB production and their potential impact.

events.name: Influence of raw materials on LIB production
events.wd_label: Influence of raw materials on LIB production
events.wd_description: Discusses the significance of raw materials on LIB production and their potential impact.
events.description: Discusses the significance of raw materials on LIB production and their potential impact.

events.name: Potential impact of raw materials on LIB production
events.wd_label: Potential impact of raw materials on LIB production
events.wd_description: Explains the influence of raw materials on LIB production and their potential impact.
events.description: Explains the influence of raw materials on LIB production and their potential impact.

events.name: Xu et al. study on LIB cell chemistries
events.wd_description: Xu et al. (2022) modeled the production of eight LIB chemistries, recommending the widespread deployment of lithium iron phosphate due to its low GHG emissions and advocating for low-carbon electricity in cell production.
events.description: Xu et al. (2022) modeled the production of eight LIB chemistries, recommending the widespread deployment of lithium iron phosphate due to its low GHG emissions and advocating for low-carbon electricity in cell production.

events.name: LIB chemistries
events.wd_description: The study modeled the production of eight different LIB cell chemistries using background LCI data.
events.description: The study modeled the production of eight different LIB cell chemistries using background LCI data.

events.name: Use of low-carbon electricity in cell production
events.wd_description: The study recommended using low-carbon electricity supply in cell production to reduce GHG emissions.
events.description: The study recommended using low-carbon electricity supply in cell production to reduce GHG emissions.

events.name: Limitations in Xu et al study
events.description: The study by Xu et al. used averaged LCIs for primary Ni and Co production and did not include electrolytic manganese production routes or secondary raw materials.

events.name: Pell & Lindsay study on solid-state and conventional LIBs
events.wd_description: Pell & Lindsay (2022) analyzed the life cycle impacts of solid-state and conventional LIBs, highlighting the significant environmental impacts of graphite production in China and the potential benefits of using recycled raw materials.
events.description: Pell & Lindsay (2022) analyzed the life cycle impacts of solid-state and conventional LIBs, highlighting the significant environmental impacts of graphite production in China and the potential benefits of using recycled raw materials.

events.name: Graphite production impacts
events.wd_description: The study found that graphite produced in China significantly contributes to the environmental impacts of LIB production.
events.description: The study found that graphite produced in China significantly contributes to the environmental impacts of LIB production.

events.name: Recycled raw materials
events.wd_description: The study suggested that recycled battery raw materials could provide an additional source of avoided impacts, though they were excluded from the analysis.
events.description: The study suggested that recycled battery raw materials could provide an additional source of avoided impacts, though they were excluded from the analysis.

events.name: Limitations in Pell and Lindsay study
events.description: The Pell & Lindsay study applied a local sensitivity analysis and excluded recycled raw materials, limiting the examination of the influence of market share among different primary supply routes.
